function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased frequency of COVID-19 infection in cold and dry conditions","Impact":"Acceleration of the spread of the virus","Mitigation":"Implementing effective ventilation and humidity control systems","Technologies":"Ventilation systems, humidity control technology","People":"Hospital patients, residents in high-density cities","Owner":"Healthcare facilities, city planning authorities"},{"Description":"Airborne transmission of COVID-19 in outdoor air between neighboring apartments","Impact":"Increased risk of contracting the virus","Mitigation":"Monitoring and controlling indoor air quality, reducing viral concentration","Technologies":"Indoor air quality monitoring systems, ventilation systems","People":"Residents in densely populated cities","Owner":"Property management, city planning authorities"},{"Description":"Fan-assisted natural ventilation increasing the risk of COVID-19 transmission","Impact":"Increased risk of contracting the virus","Mitigation":"Implementing ventilation systems that reduce the risk of airborne transmission","Technologies":"Ventilation systems, air filtration technology","People":"Hospital patients, residents in high-density cities","Owner":"Healthcare facilities, property management"}]}
